title: Amr85
author: Amr85
content: Hello,I am selling btcusa.com - a working website with good traffic with daily ~100 unique visitors.an aged domain from 1996 ~28 years old digital asset! with 2 great words BTC & USA together with the king extension .com!I have turned it into a crypto news website & since then i am getting a very good traffic with no marketing. This can easily change/modified into any crypto niche.Auction starts at $1 & increments by $10payment will be by btc of course / eth & usdt are also accepted here.Hit me up if you have any question.Thanks,

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: Does the caqn include a domain name?I think I'll bet first.BTCUSA.com - 11 USDT

comments.author: Amr85
comments.body: Thanks for starting the auction! The domain name certainly comes with the sale.

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: Quote from: Amr85 on December 02, 2023, 03:31:45 PMThanks for starting the auction! The domain name certainly comes with the sale.Description: topicStarting bid: 1$Buy it now: ?End date and time: ?Payment methods accepted: cryptoAdditional information: topicCan you explain this auction in more detail by answering a couple of questions from Auctions - Guidelines and Tips!

comments.author: Behat1981
comments.body: Here's my bidBTCUSA.com - 21 USDTDo you sell the domain and script or only the domain?It would be great if you sold the entire website

comments.author: Amr85
comments.body: Thanks for your interest. I am selling the whole thing
